channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera Faspex
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera Faspex

item.title: CVE-2022-40744|2024-07-05T17:21:26.435Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 236441.

item.title: CVE-2023-22869|2024-06-04T17:26:49.125Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 244119.

item.title: CVE-2023-27279|2024-06-04T17:24:46.228Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a user to cause a denial of service due to missing API rate limiting. IBM X-Force ID: 248533.

item.title: CVE-2023-37397|2024-06-04T17:24:39.600Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a local user to obtain or modify sensitive information due to improper encryption of certain data. IBM X-Force ID: 259672.

item.title: CVE-2023-37400|2024-06-04T17:24:36.694Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to insecure credential storage. IBM X-Force ID: 259677.

item.title: CVE-2023-37396|2024-06-04T17:24:36.284Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information due to improper encryption of certain data. IBM X-Force ID: 259671.

item.title: CVE-2023-37411|2024-05-28T12:06:05.023Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260139.

item.title: CVE-2023-37411|2024-06-28T20:09:16.406Z -- ibm -- aspera%20faspex
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.6 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260139.
